com.company.GUIPackage

Class ListWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.company.GUIPackage.ListWindow

  • public class ListWindow
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Alexey on 24.02.2017. GUI class, that show list of file and allows some operations Storage fileList - GUI List of files Storage user - currnet user of the system Storage model - List of file

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void addAction()
      Action, that performs when button "Add" was pressed show openDialog and adding select file in the List
      private void deleteAction()
      Action, that performs when button "Delete" was pressed delete select file in the list by the current User
      private void findAction()
      Action, that performs when button "Find" was pressed get text of findField and find this in the List of files
      private void offerAction()
      Action, that performs when button "offer" was pressed method for creating and sending message to administrator
      private void openAction()
      Action, that performs when button "Open" was pressed open selected item on JList and open it by the current desktop system
      private void refreshAllAction()
      Action, that performs when button "Refresh all" was pressed refresh size of all files in the list
      private void setGrid(int gridX, int gridY)
      set grid for gridBag layout
      void show()
      start show this window
